tasks: Proving isoperimetric inequalities over the hypercube
methods: Proof of stronger isoperimetric result conjectured by Talagrand
results: Proof of classical isoperimetric inequalities of Talagrand
Generalization of Friedgut's theorem for p-moment sensitivity
title: Isoperimetric Inequalities Made Simpler
abstract: We give an alternative, simple method to prove isoperimetric inequalities over the hypercube. In particular, we show:   1. An elementary proof of classical isoperimetric inequalities of Talagrand, as well as a stronger isoperimetric result conjectured by Talagrand and recently proved by Eldan and Gross.   2. A strengthening of the Friedgut junta theorem, asserting that if the $p$-moment of the sensitivity of a function is constant for some $p\geq 1/2 + \varepsilon$, then the function is close to a junta. In this language, Friedgut's theorem is the special case that $p=1$.
